com.rohanclan.cfml.editors.contentassist
Interface IAssistAttrValueContributor

All Known Implementing Classes:
CFIncludeTemplateAssist, DefaultTagAssistContributor
public interface IAssistAttrValueContributor

Clients implement this interface if they wish to provide tag attribute value insight. For example we have the following entered by the user: <cffunction returntype="" The user then invoked content assist between the quotes. A class that implements this interface will be asked for any contributions it has based upon the assist state provided to it.

Author:
Oliver Tupman

Method Summary
 Value[] getAttributeValueProposals(IAssistTagAttributeState state)
          Requests proposals from the contributor.
 

Method Detail

public Value[] getAttributeValueProposals(IAssistTagAttributeState state)
Requests proposals from the contributor.

Parameters:

Returns:
An array of strings that contains the proposals made
